messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5342041/diff/7001/src/pkg/net/http/request.go

http://codereview.appspot.com/5342041/diff/7001/src/pkg/net/http/request.go#newcode133
src/pkg/net/http/request.go:133: // Only available after ParseForm is called.
On 2011/11/04 02:46:54, rsc wrote:
> // This field is only
> or It is only

Done x 2.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5342041/diff/7001/src/pkg/net/http/request.go#newcode134
src/pkg/net/http/request.go:134: // This field is ignored by the HTTP client.
On 2011/11/04 02:46:54, rsc wrote:
> // The HTTP client ignores Form and uses Body instead.

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5342041/diff/7001/src/pkg/net/http/request.go#newcode139
src/pkg/net/http/request.go:139: // This field is ignored by the HTTP client.
On 2011/11/04 02:46:54, rsc wrote:
> // The HTTP client ignores MultipartForm and uses Body instead.

Done.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e93d0d1f82f3 ***

http: clarify Request docs

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
